TypeSignature.Value: .class nested public auto ansi beforefieldinit AxHost/InvalidActiveXStateException extends System.Exception

summary.span: 引用处于无效状态的 ActiveX 控件时引发的异常。

span.span: The exception that is thrown when the ActiveX control is referenced while in an invalid state.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 只有在完全实例化和初始化 ActiveX 控件后，才能引用 ActiveX 控件的公共属性和方法;否则，将 引发异常。The public properties and methods of an ActiveX control can only be referenced after the ActiveX control has been instantiated and initialized completely; otherwise the exception is thrown. Exception 类包含成为引用和成员类型的成员的名称。The exception class contains the name of the member that made the reference and the member type. 成员类型是 枚举值之一。The member type is one of the enumerated values. ## Examples 下面的代码示例将重写构造函数， 以及 包装 Microsoft 掩码编辑 ActiveX 控件的派生类的和方法。The following code example overrides the constructor, and the and methods of an derived class that wraps the Microsoft Masked Edit ActiveX Control. 此代码要求你通过在 MSMask32 文件上运行 AxImp.exe 来创建生成的源代码，并使用 `/source` 开关来生成要编辑的包装类。This code requires that you have created the generated source code by running the AxImp.exe on the MSMask32.ocx file with the `/source` switch to generate the wrapper class to be edited. 此代码仅在 c # 语法中显示，因为这是 AxImp.exe 唯一的语言。This code is only shown in C# syntax because that is the only language output by the AxImp.exe. [!code-csharp[AxHost_Wrap_MaskEdit#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/AxHost_Wrap_MaskEdit/CS/axmsmask.cs#1)]

summary.span: 初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

summary.span: 初始化 类的新实例，但不指定有关引用了该 ActiveX 控件的成员的信息。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class without specifying information about the member that referenced the ActiveX control.

param.name: name
param.span: 引用处于无效状态的 ActiveX 控件的成员的名称。

span.span: The name of the member that referenced the ActiveX control while it was in an invalid state.

summary.span: 初始化 类的新实例，并指示引用了该 ActiveX 控件的成员的名称及所进行的引用的种类。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class and indicates the name of the member that referenced the ActiveX control and the kind of reference it made.

remarks.format: ## Examples 下面的代码示例将重写构造函数， 以及 包装 Microsoft 掩码编辑 ActiveX 控件的派生类的和方法。The following code example overrides the constructor, and the and methods of an derived class that wraps the Microsoft Masked Edit ActiveX Control. 此代码要求你通过在 MSMask32 文件上运行 AxImp.exe 来创建生成的源代码，并使用 `/source` 开关来生成要编辑的包装类。This code requires that you have created the generated source code by running the AxImp.exe on the MSMask32.ocx file with the `/source` switch to generate the wrapper class to be edited. 此代码仅在 c # 语法中显示，因为这是 AxImp.exe 唯一的语言。This code is only shown in C# syntax because that is the only language output by the AxImp.exe. [!code-csharp[AxHost_Wrap_MaskEdit#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/AxHost_Wrap_MaskEdit/CS/axmsmask.cs#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig virtual instance string ToString() cil managed
Public Overrides Function ToString () As String

summary.span: 创建并返回当前异常的字符串表示形式。

span.span: Creates and returns a string representation of the current exception.

returns.span: 当前异常的字符串表示形式。

span.span: A string representation of the current exception.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法返回一个字符串，该字符串包含有关引用了该 ActiveX 控件的成员的信息以及在构造函数中提供此信息时所进行的引用的类型 。This method returns a string containing information about the member that referenced the ActiveX control and the kind of reference it made if this information was supplied in the constructor.
